snippet: Representative Michele Bachmann took the pulpit at the Jubilee Family Church Sunday and preached a message of redemption and winning.
abstract: Representative Michele Bachmann took the pulpit at the Jubilee Family Church Sunday and preached a message of redemption and winning.
lead_paragraph: OSKALOOSA, Iowa - Representative Michele Bachmann took the pulpit at the Jubilee Family Church here during the morning worship service on Sunday and preached from Scripture, weaving her personal story with biblical parables about redemption -- a message that seemed tailored to reassure undecided voters about the viability of her embattled campaign.

headline.main: Bachmann Makes Final Pitch to Iowa Faithful
